properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 4:09AM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with 35 to 40 kt and seas 4
to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...The ocean waters south of Long Island out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
